entities.name: ron

entities.name: sirius

relationships.description: Ron is being judged by Sirius on how he treats others.
Sirius is judging Crouch based on how he treats his inferiors.
Ron is being addressed by Hermione.
Sirius says that Hermione has a better understanding of Crouch than Ron does.
